abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed development credit would
            finance: (a) construction and equipment of eleven
            lower-secondary centers for the teaching of science,
            technology and domestic science; four lower-secondary
            schools in department capitals to replace existing temporary
            facilities; a hotel/tourism training and upgrading center;
            (b) conversion of existing facilities and minor construction
            and equipment for an industrial upgrading center; and minor
            construction and equipment for a National Marine Training
            School; (c) construction and equipment for 30 experimental
            rural education centers, equipment for an instructional
            training center for rural education and for teams
            implementing the rural education program; (d) provision of
            specialists and consultants for administration of the
            project, preparation of a follow-up project, training of
            planning/management personnel and curriculum development for
            project components, and initiation of the design for a
            nonformal urban education project; (e) provision of scholarships.
